mapper.insert: insert into product (pno, pname, price, pcnt, pimg, pdimg) values (#{pno}, #{pname}, #{price}, #{pcnt}, #{pimg}, #{pdimg})
mapper.select:
select * from product where pno> 0
and pname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pname}, '%')
select * from product order by salescnt desc limit 0, 4
mapper.update: update product set salescnt = salescnt + 1 where pno = #{pno}
